evidence.claim: True Billing Tech includes HIPAA compliance in their service offerings.
The integration capabilities mentioned in True Billing Tech's documentation include X12 transaction sets.
They utilize FHIR standards for health data management and interoperability.
True Billing Tech supports HL7 messaging protocols for healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA X12 and EDI for healthcare data exchange indicates high relevance.
